message:
الف ليلة وليلة .. من التدوين
مقالة تستحق القراءة بعناية :)
story: Ahmed Mozaly shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Lessons Learned from 1000 Days of Blogging | Riding the Waves of Personal Development
caption: theskooloflife.com
description: On April 20, 2009 I registered the domain, TheSkooloflife.com. Today my blog is 4 years old. The journey has been a perpetual roller coaster ride and opened up opportunities beyond anything I ever expected. It’s been 1000 days of blogging and the journey seems like it’s just starting.
